Nathanael Greene wrote a total of 7 people including George Washington, and Francis Marion. Most of Nathanael Greene's letters were written in the year 1782. Several other letters were written in 1781 and 1780.">

				<div class='cssbox_head'><h1>Nathanael Greene letters for the years 1776 thru 1783</h1></div>
				<div class="cssbox_body">
					<div class='ego picture'><img src='/images/historic/thumbnail/nag.jpg' alt='Nathanael Greene' /></div>



				<p class="summary">
			Nathanael Greene wrote 83 letters from a total of 34 locations including Long Island, NY, Fort Lee, NJ, and Camp At The Plains. Nathanael Greene wrote a total of 7 people including George Washington, and Francis Marion. Most of Nathanael Greene's letters were written in the year 1782. Several other letters were written in 1781 and 1780.<span class='promo related people'> <a href='/relationships.php?tla=nag'>Who did Nathanael Greene know?</a></span>	</p>
				</div>
